data.scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Formalization of Micro Food processing Enterprises Scheme (PMFME)  - Support to Group category  - Co-Operative, Others
data.benefits: Scheme provides capital subsidy @35% with credit linkage.
data.eligibility: All units preferably be engaged in processing of ODOP produce are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Unit should have minimum turnover of Rs.100 lakh. 
  2. The members should have sufficient knowledge and experience in dealing with the product for a minimum period of 3 years. 
  3. The cooperative/FPO should have sufficient internal resources or sanction from the SG to meet 10% of the project cost.
data.beneficiaries: All units preferably be engaged in processing of ODOP produce are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Unit should have minimum turnover of Rs.100 lakh. 
  2. The members should have sufficient knowledge and experience in dealing with the product for a minimum period of 3 years. 
  3. The cooperative/FPO should have sufficient internal resources or sanction from the SG to meet 10% of the project cost.
data.context: This scheme is introduced to Support for transition of existing 2,00,000 enterprises into formal framework.
data.objective: The main aim is to Increased access for the enterprises, to professional and technical support.
data.description: Scheme provides capital subsidy @35% with credit linkage and Training support.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://pmfme.mofpi.gov.in/pmfme/#/Register-New-User
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit after the approval of the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. GST Certificate 
3. Financials for Last 2 years 
4. Projected financial data 
5. Lending Bank Details 
6. Basic KYC Documents
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 
Ministry of Food Processing Industries
Panchsheel Bhawan, 
August Kranti Marg,
Khelgaon, New Delhi-110049

Email id: support-pmfme@mofpi.gov.in  
Contact Details: 011-26406500
